Allendale, Northumberland, England, UK March contest - 1st divided between West Pelton and Acomb. 4 bands competed.
Nov. 29, 2017, 11:27 a.m. Oct. 15, 2020, 10:18 a.m.
1 1st V.B.N.F. (late Acomb) Thomas Henderson Euryanthe [unknown arranger]
2 West Pelton Volunteers Thomas Woods The Bohemian Girl [unknown arranger]
3 Stanhope Silver Thomas Woods The Bohemian Girl [unknown arranger]
4 Allendale Town Thomas Woods Reminiscences of Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
